Row.Text: Levy (Frontline)
This Unit has been [ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levied.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It has Max 75 HP.
This Unit has been [ICON_JFD_LEVIES] Levied. It will be disbanded when upon you return to peace with all current (major) foes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It has Max 75 HP.
The Great {1_Desc}

It has come to light that a Great {1_Desc} is to be hosted by the {2_Ruler} of {3_City}. However, it seems that we were not invited. We might only interpret this as either a grave insult or as an innocent mistake.[NEWLINE]
Well, what's a Great {1_Desc}? I suppose it would be frightfully dull...
We will be in attendance!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]The [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_City}'s 'We Love the King Day' ends[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
Although it may pain us to admit, we have nonetheless accepted that we were simply not invited to a Great {1_Desc} hosted by the ruler of {2_City}.
Whether invited or not, we are determined to be in attendance at a Great {1_Desc} hosted by the ruler of {2_City}. It is a matter of respect!
Insane Ruler

Unfortunately, the prognosis for the {1_Ruler} of {2_City} is grim. They waste away the nights prowling the streets, cackling at passersby and howling at the moon. They even on occasion mistake themselves for a cabbage! It is clear their tenure over {2_City} must come to an end.[NEWLINE]
It is time to remove them from office.
We cannot dishonour the importance of their family and service.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]{1_City} goes into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_City} begins celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 20 turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
The demented ruler of {1_City} has been removed from their station. In spite of opposition from their household, we have been applauded for this neccessary decision.
We have declined to remove the demented ruler of {1_City} from their station. Although this may sacrifice the city's present, it is for the sake of their future that we do this.
Request for Support

Complaining of high taxes and little opportunity for promotion, the {2_Ruler} of {3_Province} has requested that we offer to them a show of our support in exchange for their continued service.[NEWLINE]
Absolutely not! Is it not enough that they govern under my prosperous reign?
Very well then. They have earned their place.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} {2_Yield}[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {3_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[ENDCOLOR]
We have declined to support the request of the malcontent ruler of {1_City}.
We have agreed, at great expense, to support the request of the ruler of {1_City}.
Unsatisfied Ruler
The {1_Ruler} of {2_City} has recently made it known that they are not satisfied with their station. They request that we grant them a higher title, worthy of their status.[NEWLINE]
Yes, perhaps it should be so.
The greedy lout shall get no such thing!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_City} becomes a {3_Icon} {4_Desc}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]25% chance {1_City} will go into 1 turn of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance[ENDCOLOR]
We have agreed to elevate the status of the ruler of {1_City}. They shall show gratitude by bringing to their station newfound wealth.
We have denied the request of the ruler of {1_City} to be elevated to a higher status. Fortunately, they accepted this with grace.
We have denied the request of the ruler of {1_City} to be elevated to a higher status. With this, they were not pleased.
